## Public Member Functions

### assignCustomValue() {#abcdfa9adfee0c237b61d8708183f1006}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual unsigned llvm::CallLowering::ValueHandler::assignCustomValue (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/calllowering/arginfo">ArgInfo</a> &amp; Arg, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign">CCValAssign</a> &gt; VAs, std::function&lt; void()&gt; &#42; Thunk=nullptr)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Handle custom values, which may be passed into one or more of <code>VAs</code>.

<code>If</code> the handler wants the assignments to be delayed until after mem loc assignments, then it sets <code>Thunk</code> to the thunk to do the assignment. 
<SectionUser title="Returns">
The number of <code>VAs</code> that have been assigned including the first one, and which should therefore be skipped from further processing.
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/calllowering-h/#l00308">308</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/calllowering-h">CallLowering.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### assignValueToAddress() {#a8d06ef014ba7f9e056d6765150614386}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual void llvm::CallLowering::ValueHandler::assignValueToAddress (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> ValVReg, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Addr, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt">LLT</a> MemTy, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinepointerinfo">MachinePointerInfo</a> &amp; MPO, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign">CCValAssign</a> &amp; VA)</>}>
The specified value has been assigned to a stack location.

Load or store it there, with appropriate extension if necessary.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/calllowering-h/#l00287">287</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/calllowering-h">CallLowering.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### assignValueToAddress() {#a4ca87ef18ce284cfcf8e69d180b08979}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual void llvm::CallLowering::ValueHandler::assignValueToAddress (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/calllowering/arginfo">ArgInfo</a> &amp; Arg, unsigned ValRegIndex, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Addr, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt">LLT</a> MemTy, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinepointerinfo">MachinePointerInfo</a> &amp; MPO, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign">CCValAssign</a> &amp; VA)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
An overload which takes an <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/calllowering/arginfo">ArgInfo</a> if additional information about the arg is needed.

<code>ValRegIndex</code> is the index in <code>Arg.Regs</code> for the value to store.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/calllowering-h/#l00294">294</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/calllowering-h">CallLowering.h</a>.

### copyArgumentMemory() {#a2a681b9303b51d21a9392975a6cd422c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void CallLowering::ValueHandler::copyArgumentMemory (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/calllowering/arginfo">ArgInfo</a> &amp; Arg, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> DstPtr, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> SrcPtr, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinepointerinfo">MachinePointerInfo</a> &amp; DstPtrInfo, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> DstAlign, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinepointerinfo">MachinePointerInfo</a> &amp; SrcPtrInfo, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> SrcAlign, uint64&#95;t MemSize, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign">CCValAssign</a> &amp; VA) const</>}>
Do a memory copy of <code>MemSize</code> bytes from <code>SrcPtr</code> to <code>DstPtr</code>.

This is necessary for outgoing stack-passed byval arguments.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/calllowering-h/#l00318">318</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/calllowering-h">CallLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/calllowering-cpp/#l01268">1268</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/calllowering-cpp">CallLowering.cpp</a>.

### extendRegister() {#a9b9867c23ea2c20125ffe635160cb9bb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Register CallLowering::ValueHandler::extendRegister (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> ValReg, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign">CCValAssign</a> &amp; VA, unsigned MaxSizeBits=0)</>}>
Extend a register to the location type given in VA, capped at extending to at most MaxSize bits.

If MaxSizeBits is 0 then no maximum is set.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/calllowering-h/#l00325">325</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/calllowering-h">CallLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/calllowering-cpp/#l01291">1291</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/calllowering-cpp">CallLowering.cpp</a>.

### getStackAddress() {#a3c59b9c547e0a0eaab82ed083154ee22}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual Register llvm::CallLowering::ValueHandler::getStackAddress (uint64&#95;t MemSize, int64&#95;t Offset, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinepointerinfo">MachinePointerInfo</a> &amp; MPO, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/isd/argflagsty">ISD::ArgFlagsTy</a> Flags)</>}>
Materialize a VReg containing the address of the specified stack-based object.

This is either based on a FrameIndex or direct SP manipulation, depending on the context. <code>MPO</code> should be initialized to an appropriate description of the address created.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/calllowering-h/#l00265">265</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/calllowering-h">CallLowering.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getStackValueStoreType() {#a5176666164b27a32c0b6093b921cde29}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLT CallLowering::ValueHandler::getStackValueStoreType (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &amp; DL, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign">CCValAssign</a> &amp; VA, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/isd/argflagsty">ISD::ArgFlagsTy</a> Flags) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Return the in-memory size to write for the argument at <code>VA</code>.

This may be smaller than the allocated stack slot size.

This is overridable primarily for targets to maintain compatibility with hacks around the existing DAG call lowering infrastructure.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/calllowering-h/#l00274">274</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/calllowering-h">CallLowering.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/calllowering-cpp/#l01245">1245</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/calllowering-cpp">CallLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### isIncomingArgumentHandler() {#a7e3835a69edc9dcb7eed477ae19a72cb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::CallLowering::ValueHandler::isIncomingArgumentHandler () const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Returns true if the handler is dealing with incoming arguments, i.e.

those that move values from some physical location to vregs.
